law.history: Repealed 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 113, sec. 8, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 179, sec. 25. -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 153, sec. 35. -- Created 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 147, sec. 3.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Intrastate certificates of convenience and necessity -- Charter permits -- Hearings.
